body: Love the art style, gives me some late 90's/early 2000's vibe
@Bezos artists are now for their wealth. The way you disconnected wealth from fame was particularly on point, as fame and wealth are rarely related for artists.
This will end just like all his other series. The wife will go with the chad and abandon her family because the sex is so good.
Another long story/chapter from sanbun, boy sign me up.
not really for it being a long series.It is due to the antiquated execution of shock value as main substance and the characters supporting it.

Seems like less and less people interested in his long series and I'm too. it's tiring bruh. love Sanbun but you gotta give up on this and just focus on shorter stories. maybe a crossover sometimes between them. it'll be a lot more productive for him
the takeuchi of ntr.If it works it works ,doesn't matter how retarded the premise flows.
"Oh, and i forgot to mention it most likely won't be worth it but that's just my opinion you will have to decide that for yourself.
Just a warning if you want to read this it's most likely a long-term commitment. 5 raw chapters so far but it will probably have 20 by the time its completed.
The author really needs to retire from this shit man. Why the goddamn long series always? Man pushing himself harder than us beating our meats
